title: McAfee Internet Security suite 2009, working with updates (for o
description:
Tried so many torrents and failed installing McAfee? This one will work 100% with your own email and allow updates until 2010.
This verson of Mcafee internet security has been ripped from a cd that comes free for sky (uk) internet users as a means of protection and works on all windows versons. 
The filename inside the rar file says McAfee07 but dont let this put you off installing as I promise it will work with latest updates and definitions untill 2010.

It will install McAfee serurity center along with:

McAfee - VirusScan
McAfee - Personal Firewall
McAfee - Spam Killer
McAfee - Privacy Service
McAfee - Data Backup
And
McAfee - Site advisor (read below on how to install)

**Installation Instructions**
To install simply click the McAfee install icon, follow the on screen prompts and use your own email to register.
If you've registered before you can get a new subscription by just logging in during installation.

After installation of security centre, to install mcafee web adviser go into the "SiteAdvisor Ent-Plus 2" and click onto
install "setup_SAE.exe"

All comments welcome,
Enjoy, koski316 "boing boing!".
